content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Your personal information is stored by EPAM and/or our service providers, strictly to the extent necessary for the performance of our obligations and only for the time necessary to achieve the purposes for which the information is collected, in accordance with applicable law. When EPAM no longer needs to use your personal information or does not need to retain it for compliance with any legal or regulatory purpose, we will take reasonable steps to remove it from our systems and/or records and/or take steps to properly anonymize it so that you can no longer be identified from it. Your personal information will be retained for a maximum of 10 (ten) years after the termination of your employment, unless a different period is established by law or regulation for a specific processing, without prejudice to this period being extended to the duration of any legal proceedings. The information necessary for billing purposes shall be kept for a period of 10 (ten) years.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
